Literature.Title: Membrane-Active Cyclic Amphiphilic Peptides: Broad-Spectrum Antibacterial Activity Alone and in Combination with Antibiotics.
Literature.Author: Mohammed EHM, Lohan S, Ghaffari T, Gupta S, Tiwari RK, Parang K

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human fibroblasts MRC-5:2% Cytotoxicity=100 µg/ml,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:25% Cytotoxicity=100 µg/ml,Human hepatocyte cells HepaRG:9% Cytotoxicity=100 µg/ml,Human skin fibroblasts:30% Cytotoxicity=100 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=340 µg/ml
